topics.body:
"@Virgil Stormblade":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ab51dd6368725a9b003437#post_55ab51dd6368725a9b003437

No complaints on the design. It's the execution of how the characters were written.

You can a a very nice and gorgeous design, but if the story is mediocre at best it serves no more purpose. Like those shiny eggs they sell, they look good but they're empty and there's nothing else to them.

~And now bad memories flow back...~
